name: NAMES
description: The table extracts data from the Person Name (EAN) master file. These records store name information (first/last, academic suffix, etc).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The is the internal ID of the record

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This is the name of the record

columns.name: LAST_NAME_SPOUSE
columns.description: Stores the part of the person's last name from their spouse.

columns.name: LAST_NAME_PREFIX
columns.description: Stores the person's last name prefix.

columns.name: PREFERRED_NAME
columns.description: Stores the name the person prefers to be called.

columns.name: GIVEN_NAME_INITIALS
columns.description: The initials for the person's given names.
